Description:
Our client is a Leading Management Consulting Company. They are now looking for a Recruitment Coordinator to join them. Roles & Responsibilities Providing administrative support on Recruitment related activities
Drafting and posting job descriptions on the career portals
Uploading CVs and documents into the Candidate Management System
Screening applications and maintaining the candidate's database including filing
Candidate relation management, including but not limited to candidate liaison, test & interview scheduling, candidate feedback, etc.
Coordinating and scheduling interviews, updating calendars accordingly, and monitoring emails. Salary: AED 7000 - AED 8000Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a Recruitment Coordinator in the region preferably within an international company
Knowledge of candidate selection methods and understanding of full-cycle talent acquisition processes
Hands-on experience with Outlook, Excel, Applicant Tracking System (ATS), and job boards especially LinkedIn
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills

Good time-management skills
Great interpersonal and communication skills
MBA in Marketing/ BBA/ B.com etc
Excellent team player
